author: clkao
msg: Export functions from svn_utf.h so we can call svn_utf_initialize.

author: pburba
msg: Port of svn lock and unlock via file:/// for OS/400.
The --encoding option for svn lock is disabled as we have no plans to
When using -F file to set a lock comment the file must be encoded in utf-8
(get_comment): Accomodate utf-8 restriction when translating lock comments
svn_io_open_unique_file to native encoding before passing to apr_stat.

author: pburba
msg: Per suggestion from Philip Martin, main is a more suitable location to
convert --transaction arg to utf-8.  His larger question regarding the
applicability of this patch to trunk is still an open one.
(main): Convert --transaction opt_arg to utf-8 before storing in
